pageDescription: Everything you need to know about the event.

items.question: What is Hack The Breach?
items.answer: Hack The Breach is a premier cybersecurity workshop and capture-the-flag (CTF) hackathon that brings together security professionals, researchers, students, and enthusiasts. It features expert-led workshops, insightful talks, and hands-on challenges focused on the latest trends and techniques in cybersecurity.

items.question: When and where will the event take place?
items.answer: The event will be held online from March 29th to April 12th, 2025, via Google Meet.

items.question: Who can participate?
items.answer: Hack The Breach is open to participants of all skill levels—from beginners to experienced security professionals. Whether you're a student, researcher, industry expert, or just passionate about cybersecurity, there’s something for everyone.

items.question: Are there any prerequisites to participate?
items.answer: No prior experience is required! While a basic understanding of computer systems and networks can be helpful, our workshops and challenges cater to all skill levels, including beginner-friendly sessions.

items.question: Is there a registration fee?
items.answer: No, participation is completely free! You can join our workshops, talks, and challenges at no cost.

items.question: Will there be prizes for the competition?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our competition features an exciting prize pool, including exclusive goodies and kits for top performers.
